summary_md: Italy, in the latest year, has a GDP per capita (34,398 USD per person) and an inflation rate (0.98%). The unemployment rate (6.78%) and life expectancy (83.70 years) are also recorded. Internet usage (87.00%) and the share of exports in GDP (32.73%) are indicators of the country's economic and digital environment.
